definition: level with one's shoulders/(of two people) both the same height
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: Opposite the ch air was a window with a shoulder-high cloth curtain.
sentences.chinese: 椅子正對着一扇窗戶，上面掛着一塊齊肩高的布窗簾。

sentences.english: The cut took my nearing-my-waist hairstyle and brought it up to shoulder length.
sentences.chinese: 那次剪髮將我原本齊腰長的頭髮剪短到了齊肩長。

sentences.english: She has shoulder-length brown hair with a side parting.
sentences.chinese: 她褐色的頭髮側分着，長髮齊肩。

sentences.english: Her black hair framed her angular face and reached her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 她一頭黑髮齊肩，突顯出有棱有角的臉龐。

sentences.english: Opposite the chair was a window with a shoulder-high cloth curtain.
sentences.chinese: 對着椅子的是窗戶，窗簾剛好與人齊肩。

sentences.english: The woman had shoulder-length reddish hair and pale freckled skin.
sentences.chinese: 那個女人留着齊肩長的微紅色頭髮，皮膚蒼白有雀斑。

sentences.english: Because hair grows slowly, shoulder-length hair reveals several years of a woman's health status.
sentences.chinese: 齊肩長髮可以透露出一個女人幾年內的健康狀況。

sentences.english: Shoulder length, with a long fringe.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮齊肩，並留長的劉海。

sentences.english: He's tall and thin with shoulder-length, straight blond hair.
sentences.chinese: 他很高很瘦，他留着金黃色的頭髮，齊肩長。

sentences.english: He was white, with brown shoulder-length hair and a moustache.
sentences.chinese: 他是個白人，留着棕色的齊肩發並蓄着小鬍子。
